title: Society of Soul
text:
Society of Soul was a five-member R&B group that consisted of the members of Organized Noize (Sleepy Brown, Rico Wade and Ray Murray) as well as Espraronza and Big Rube.


== Discography ==


=== Albums ===
Brainchild (1995)


=== Singles ===
"Pushin'"
"Embrace"
